name: Necromancer Duel
description:
This is a Ludum Dare 44 entry. It was made in a weekend by a busy old man. This is still a prototype. Be gentle with criticism. :)

Defeat the red necromancer by using your life force to summon the undead!

Played in turns, you can click the blue pieces to see where they can move. After moving, your pieces will attack nearby enemies

Get to zero health and you die, so don't summon too much!
